Name: Alphard Trading Company
Details: The original Alphard Trading Corporation was originally a single company headquartered in the Free Worlds League. During the 2720s ATC underwent a major expansion, forming several new subsidiaries across the Periphery. During the Succession Wars, the ATC main office ceased operations, leaving the many subsidiaries to operate independently. Two of these branches are located at Perdition in the Taurian Concordat and at Alphard in the Marian Hegemony.
